title: Diamond no Ace
alternative_title: Ace of Diamond, Daiya no Ace, Ace of the Diamond, Dia no A, ダイヤのA[エース]
description: The story follows Eijun Sawamura, a pitcher who joins an elite school with a brilliant catcher named Kazuya Miyuki. Together with the rest of the team, they strive for Japan’s storied Koushien championships through hard work and determination.
